page.title: 08Housing Survey of Stoke Hill
page.content: Stoke Hill Middle School did a housing survey of square 9394. This is the square that our school is in and the survey showed there is quite a mixture of types of housing. { {Detached houses}=138 {Semi-detached houses}=216 {Terraced houses}=403 {Bungalows}=20 {Flats}=168 {Total}=945 The area which we have surveyed consists almost entirely of property built within the last 50 years.About one quarter of the total was originally built by the council for renting, but a proportion of this is now owner-occupied.About 10% of the homes are rented from a private property company.The remainder have been built for sale.These have been erected during the past three years and building is still taking place.
